channel.title: Enabling Ice Barrage but adding time limit

item.title: Enabling Ice Barrage but adding time limit
item.dc:creator: @123lol321 123lol321
item.description:
@123lol321 wrote:

Hey I’ve used several guides they talk about using it but I got that part but when i get in game and use it nothing happens (No Damage) And also was wondering if someone could tell/teach me how to add a timer to i so I wouldn’t have massers.

Here is my GFX code for Ice barrage just in-case ya need:

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true))
{
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40);
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60);
startAnimation(1979);
attackNPCSWithin(260, 20, 0);
//hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
sendMessage(“You poison and freeze the enemy!”);
//stillgfx(370, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Enabling Ice Barrage but adding time limit
